metadata.Name: NEREL
metadata.Description: A Russian dataset of news articles from the Lenta.ru news website, annotated manually with nested named entities, relations, and events. The annotation scheme includes 3 entity types (Person, Location, Organization), 13 relations, and 3 event types with 33 arguments.
metadata.Paper Title: NEREL: A Russian Dataset with Nested Named Entities, Relations and Events
metadata.Venue Title: Findings of the Association for Computational Linguistics: EMNLP 2021
metadata.Venue Name: Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing
metadata.Abstract: We present NEREL, a new dataset for Russian language with nested named entities, relations, and events. The data is based on news texts from a large Russian news agency. The dataset contains 938 news texts (about 14,500 sentences, 250,000 tokens) annotated manually. The annotation scheme includes 3 entity types (Person, Location, Organization), 13 relations between them, and 3 event types with 33 arguments. The dataset is the first in Russian to feature nested entities, events, and a large number of n-ary relations. We provide a train/dev/test split and baselines for named entity recognition, relation extraction, and event extraction. The dataset is available at https://github.com/nerel-ds/NEREL.
